_sText:
"Just an update/rebuild of assault, trying to stay as true as possible to the original assault while bringing it up to date and hopefully

This was our first real map after learning the basics of hammer.

Mainly built as a map for the www.5punk.co.uk gameserver, but we've decided to release due to maps like assault 2005

A version with 40 spawn points may be made available if there's demand

Known bugs:
Ladder into vent from roof is difficult to detatch from (engine issue i think)
Some white-line issues in places (anyone know a fix?)
Sounds don't always trigger."
